financial_terms.taxes_and_fees: Processing fee, insurance charges, documentation charges, and applicable stamp duty as per ICICI Bank policy

loan_specific_terms.amortization_type: Equated Monthly Instalments (EMI) with fixed interest rate
loan_specific_terms.prepayment_penalty: Foreclosure charges up to 3% of principal outstanding depending on loan seasoning; nil after specified tenure
loan_specific_terms.late_fee_rules: Penal interest of approximately 5% per annum on overdue amounts and applicable cheque dishonour charges

contract_metadata.vendor_source: ICICI Bank Car Loan and Two Wheeler Loan Agreement / Key Facts Statement
